content: the basket weave rib socks are the kind of socks i love to knit with an easy to remember pattern they are interesting to knit and still simple enough to knit anywhere or to knit while watching tv the patterning is perfectly unisex and is great for showing off your solid and semi solid yarns **xlarge size has been added 31 may 2013 - if you downloaded pattern prior this you will need to re-download to get xl size this is not automatic on ravelry with a free pattern** *join my facebook group 1 to keep up to date with new designs sneak peeks giveaways and discounts * 1 https //www facebook com/sezzaknits **errata** - the length of the leg is intended to be 6 /**15cm** before working the heel flap medium ~ 7 5 - 8 5 /19 - 21 5cm circumference large ~ 9 10 /23 25 5cm circumference xlarge ~10 5 - 11 5 /27-29cm circumference pattern has been test knit and professionally tech-edited i am offering this pattern for free as a karmic thank you for the free sock patterns i have enjoyed in the past you are welcome to sell your completed items please do not claim the pattern as your own or distribute this pattern yourself
